contentrichtext.text: {| width=100% style="background:none;" |- align="center" |colspan="2" style="border:1px solid #bfd7ff; background-color:#f5f9ff; padding:10px;"| {{/countdown}} |- |valign="top" width="50%" style="border:1px solid #bfd7ff; background-color:#f5f9ff;"| {{/leftpanel}} |valign="top" style="border:1px solid #bfd7ff; background-color:#f5f9ff;"| {{/rightpanel}} |- align="center" |colspan="2" valign="top" style="border:1px solid #bfd7ff; background-color:#f5f9ff;"| {| width="100%" cellspacing="10" style="background-color:#f5f9ff;" |- <!-- Article alerts --> ! style="border:1px solid #a3bfb1; background-color:#D4DAFF; padding:0.2em 0.4em; font-size:120%; font-weight:bold; text-align:left;"|Article alerts |- | Click [[Wikipedia:WikiProject Eurovision/Article alerts|here]] to view this list in full. {{/Article alerts}} |- <!-- Article requests --> ! style="border:1px solid #a3bfb1; background-color:#D4DAFF; padding:0.2em 0.4em; font-size:120%; font-weight:bold; text-align:left;"|Article requests |- | *Click [[Wikipedia:WikiProject Eurovision/Article requests|here]] to make a request for a Eurovision related article to be created. |- |} |- |colspan="2" style="border:1px solid #bfd7ff; background-color:#f5f9ff;"| <!-- MEMBERS PANEL --> {| width="100%" cellspacing="10" style="background-color:#f5f9ff;" |- ! style="border:1px solid #bfd7ff; background-color:#e1edff; padding:0.2em 0.4em; font-size:120%; font-weight:bold; text-align:left;"| Members |- |This is a [[Wikipedia:WikiProject Eurovision/Members|list of Wikipedians]] who are committed to this WikiProject. If you're interested in helping, feel free to join by editing the table below and placing your username, in ''alphabetical order'', using the {{tl|user}} template (e.g. <code><nowiki>{{user|USERNAME}}</nowiki></code>). If you wish, leave a comment about your special interests on this project. {| width="100%" cellpadding="5" style="border:1px solid #bfd7ff; border-collapse:collapse; margin-top:10px;" ! style="border:1px solid #bfd7ff; background-color:#e1edff;" width="30%"| User ! style="border:1px solid #bfd7ff; background-color:#e1edff; border-right:0px;"| Comments ! style="border:1px solid #bfd7ff; background-color:#e1edff; border-left:0px;"| {{ed right2|Wikipedia:WikiProject Eurovision/Members}} |- |colspan="3"| <div style="height:300px; overflow:auto; padding:3px;">{{Wikipedia:WikiProject Eurovision/Members}}</div> |} |} <!-- END OF MEMBERS PANEL --> |} __NOTOC__ ==Related projects== {{WikiProject Music/Related WikiProjects}} {{Wikipedia policies and guidelines|state=collapsed}} {{WikiProject Footer}} [[Category:WikiProject Eurovision| ]] [[pt:Wikipedia:Projetos/Eurovisão]] [[ru:Википедия:Проект:Конкурс песни «Евровидение»]]
